text: Hey <@U01QVR44MEY>, I wanted to let you know that using the endpoints directly with requests works well, as you suggested. Thanks a lot for your advice

what do you mean when you say you can’t figure it out? It sounds like the operation the right object key/val you’re looking for would be:
`importOperations: {"0-1": "UPSERT"}`

However, if you’re looking to have the operation decided based on email (opposed to record ID), I think you’ll want to make sure to set the `columnType`  parameter on the email column/object to `"HubSpot_ALTERNATE_ID"` .

Might want to consider using one of the legacy endpoints as well, tailor made for contact upserts, depending on the specifics of your situation: <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/contacts/batch_create_or_update>

Good morning,
Does anyone have any experience in loading a large number of images into HubSpot file manager ?
I can't find a good KB to help with the API POST ?
